mama puruddak hatiyatama hama madhyayakma asuru kala .ee pasal yana kale idanmayi.ee kale thibune mudritha madhya.kisima wikalpa mathayakata ida denne na.janahamuwa kiyala hari kathuta liyum kiyala hari mahajana adahas walata pituwak wen karanawane.kawadawath mahajanayata ee pituwata yamak kiyanna ba.mata mathakayi ek pathtahreka mahajana pituwe keti adahas dakwim karapu ayage nam.kossinne ranasinha,walikalage siripala,udugoda daya nugekotuwa.mehema minissu me loke na.loku boruwakne me karanne.

shani ha chandra mangala yoga dakwimath chandra mangala yogaye paladim gana wisthara kirimath tharamak pramada karami.eeta prathama yamak pawasimata atha.aththatama eya podi bayila paraki.blog liyannan atharin pathara bayila gasima samanya sirithaki.mamada eya idahita karami.100%k wes perala liyana mage anith blogaya thanikarama bayila blogayaki.namuth eya kiyawimata pirisa wadiya.jyothishaya gana liyawena mema blogaya praweshamen siruwata liwimata ma nithara uthsaha karanne eya mage jiwana wruththiya menma paramparikawa mahata uruma wu shasthrayak ha badi athi bawini.bayila blogaya liwimata wada jyothishaya gana liyawena mema blog adawiye lipi liwima itha asiruya.atham shasthriya karunu gana liwimata prathama ma wadihiti jyothisha wedin kihipa denekugenma adahas wimasa balanne sulu waradimak ho sidu wuwahoth eya maha winashayak badu wana bawini.

2017 janawari mada wanawita apata labuna aluthma aaranchiya nam, me gatawara wayasedima china komiyunist pakshayata bandi deshapalanaya arambau sirisena mahatha, 2015 nowambar masa parisiyedi thampalawela dhammarathana (yuneskowe bauddha niyojitha) himiyan hamuwa yahapalanaya ha buddhagama gana kala payaka sakachchawe prathipalayak washayen budist ayidiyals of gud gawarnans (bauddha rajya palana prathipaththi) yanuwen pothak sorbon wishwa widyalaya magin palakara athi bawaya.
